subject: Checking Order Status
description_text:
Hello, I wanted to reach out and check the order status of my Plus X Pedals
and 2 Pack of VAM Pros. I ordered them through Amazon with an estimated
delivery window of January 15th - 20th but according to my tacking the
order's information has been received by SF-Express but it hasn't been
shipped yet. So I just wanted to check if that delivery windows was
accurate or if I should expect something different.

My tracking number is:
SF6047221878010

Thank you for you help.

conversations.body_text: Hello, today I received just the VAM Pros that I ordered but I haven't received the Plus X pedals. Since they seemingly came in a different package. But I don't have a second tracking number. I was wondering where I would find that or if there was an issue. Thank you

Hi Noah Cabral,  Here is your tracking number for the pedals: 887920054401,   (ships from US warehouse, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack ), Our US warehouse will arrange for the shipping carrier to pick up the goods on Monday morning.  The tracking information will be updated after the pickup.
